text: Herbie Goes Bananas is a 1980 American adventure criminal comedy movie directed by Vincent McEveety and is the fourth movie in the Herbie franchise. It stars Cloris Leachman, Charles Martin Smith, Stephan W. Burns, John Vernon, Elyssa Davalos, Joaquin Garay III and Harvey Korman and is the sequel to the 1977 movie Herbie Goes to Monte Carlo. It was produced by Walt Disney Productions and was distributed by Buena Vista Distribution. == Other websites == * * * Category:1980 adventure movies Category:1980s criminal comedy movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:Herbie movies Category:Movies set in Mexico Category:Movies about automobiles Category:Movies about orphans Category:1980s English-language movies Category:Disney movies Category:Adventure comedy movies Category:American sequel movies Category:1980 crime movies Category:Movies set on ships Category:American family comedy movies Category:Movies about outlaws
title: Herbie Goes Bananas
